main event: A metallic, disc-shaped object was observed hovering and then accelerating and disappearing near Bitburg, Germany in 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as being metallic and disc-shaped, measuring 15-20 feet in diameter.
The object maneuvered at a very high rate of speed, estimated at over 500 feet above the ground.
The object appeared bright white in color and made no sound.
Another sighting from 1958 near Bitburg described a cone-shaped object that emitted a bright light at the top.
Sightings of fast-moving, unidentified objects were said to be becoming more frequent in the area.
photographs: No, the report does not include any photographs.
